thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 11 of 110
thread.title: JOCROSS99

author: JOCROSS99
title: JOCROSS99
text: I really learned a lot from iDriveSafely and they were patient as it took time for me to finish the course, I had many distractions and business to take care of and they honored the original payment. Even though I did not finish the course in 30 days, they enabled me to finish later wishing another 30 day period and at no extra charge. My insurance company accepted the certificate and I was very happy to receive it fast a few days after completing the course.
